scripts.pdf: mkdir ../resources && PDF=true yarn build && PDF=true yarn serve --no-open & sleep 20 && PUPPETEER_DOWNLOAD_BASE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/chrome-for-testing-public npx docs-to-pdf --outputPDFFilename="../resources/1-syllabus.pdf" --initialDocURLs="http://localhost:3000/" --baseUrl="https://software-design.ianapplebaum.com" --contentSelector="main" --paginationSelector="a.pagination-nav__link.pagination-nav__link--next" --excludeSelectors=".margin-vert--xl a,[class^='tocCollapsible'],.breadcrumbs,.theme-edit-this-page" --coverImage="https://capstone.ianapplebaum.com/img/dont-panic.svg" --coverTitle="3296 Software Design $SEMESTER_YEAR Course Syllabus" && PUPPETEER_DOWNLOAD_BASE_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/chrome-for-testing-public npx docs-to-pdf --outputPDFFilename="../resources/2-docs.pdf" --initialDocURLs="http://localhost:3000/docs/proposal" --baseUrl="https://software-design.ianapplebaum.com" --contentSelector="main" --paginationSelector="a.pagination-nav__link.pagination-nav__link--next" --excludeSelectors=".margin-vert--xl a,[class^='tocCollapsible'],.breadcrumbs,.theme-edit-this-page" --coverImage="https://capstone.ianapplebaum.com/img/dont-panic.svg" --coverTitle="3296 Software Design Documentation Descriptions"
